word_mean: 排泄，分泌：通过正常排泄途经而逐出或排除，如废物

sentence.Network_en: Your open pores excrete sweat and dirt.
sentence.Network_cn: 通过张开的毛孔排出汗液和污垢。

sentence.Network_en: The function of the kidneys is to excrete wastes from the body.
sentence.Network_cn: 肾的功能是排泄人体里的废物.

sentence.Network_en: The function of the kidneys is to excrete waste products.
sentence.Network_cn: 肾脏的功能是排泄代谢废物.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 字根字尾构词法.doc - 豆丁网 ... exclude 拒绝,排除 excrete 排泄 exculpate 使无罪,证明无罪.
英语中有哪些单词易混淆的?_爱问知识人 ... excoriate 批判 excrete 排出 execrable 该厌恶的.

list.abs: excreta 排泄物excreting duct 排泄管excretion 排泄

excretion 排泄excretion monitoring 排泄物监测excursion 功率骤增
11.分泌型载体(excretion vector) 一种表达载体, 在基因克隆位点前有一段信号肽, 可使被克隆基因的表达产物定向分泌到细胞外 12.假基因(pseudogene) 具有部分.

derivation.yuyuan_name: early 17th cent.(in the sense 'cause to excrete'): from Latin excret- 'sifted out', from the verb excernere, from ex- 'out' + cernere 'sift'

entry.def: When a person or animal excretes waste matter from their body, they get rid of it in faeces, urine, or sweat.

example.ex: Your open pores excrete sweat and dirt...
example.tran: 通过张开的毛孔排出汗液和污垢。

example.ex: Calcium is excreted in the urine and stools.
example.tran: 钙通过尿液和粪便排出体外。

auth_sentence.content: Squids...excrete their ink in order to repel predators.
auth_sentence.res_content: Squids...excrete their ink in order to repel predators.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Squids...excrete their ink in order to repel predators.

auth_sentence.content: Cows fed on Brachiaria excrete much less methane, a greenhouse gas.
auth_sentence.res_content: Cows fed on Brachiaria excrete much less methane, a greenhouse gas.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Cows fed on Brachiaria excrete much less methane, a greenhouse gas.

sentences.en: Most toxins are naturally excreted from the body.
sentences.cn: 大部分毒素被自然排出体外。

sentences.en: The function of the kidneys is to excrete wastes from the body.
sentences.cn: 肾的功能是排泄人体里的废物。

sentences.en: The larvae may be excreted in the faeces.
